title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search
name: Field Search
description: New tabs are added to search results
author: Mario Pietsch
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/config/field-search/data/Any Field":{"text":"{ "*": "any field" }","type":"application/json","caption":"Any Field","tags":"$:/tags/field-search/data","title":"$:/config/field-search/data/Any Field"},"$:/config/field-search/exclude":{"title":"$:/config/field-search/exclude","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"bag revision exclude draft.of draft.title"},"$:/config/field-search/sortby":{"title":"$:/config/field-search/sortby","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"title text tags caption subtitle creator modifier created modified type"},"$:/config/field-search/tab/Any Field":{"title":"$:/config/field-search/tab/Any Field","caption":"Any Field","opt-checked":"[all[]]","opt-unchecked":"[!is[system]]","search-set":"[!is[system]]","search-sort":"[sort[title]limit[250]]","tags":"$:/tags/SearchResults","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define searchTerm() [search:$(field)$] <$list filter="[[$:/config/field-search/data/Any Field]indexes[]sortby{$:/config/field-search/sortby}]" variable=field emptyMessage="[[- configuration needed -|$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/readme]]"> {{||$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/templates/Results}} "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/css/column-styles":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/css/column-styles","text":"/* columns responsive*/ .c2, .c3, .columns2, .columns3 { column-rule: 1px solid #ccc; column-gap: 2em; } .c2, .columns2 { column-count:2;} .c3, .columns3 { column-count:3;} .-gap { column-gap: initial;} .-cr { column-rule: initial;} .wltc-max-width { width: 100%; }","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/styles":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/styles","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":".wltc-show-system { float: right; cursor: pointer; } .wltc-show-system input { visibility: hidden; margin-left: -1em; width: initial; } .wltc-show-system input[checked] + span{ color: blue; font-weight: bold; }"},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/history","text":"V 1.0.1 - 2024-05-23 * Add stability badges ** The development status of a plugin: deprecated, experimental, stable, or legacy V 1.0.0 - 2024-04-18 * Settings are now in $:/ControlPanel -> ''Settings'' -> ''WikiLabs'' tab V 0.5.0 - 2022-03-27 * update to TW v5.2.2 * ''Important'': Changed license to Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike -- [[CC-BY-NC-SA|$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/license]] V 0.4.1 - 2021-03-28 * add match counter into field-search dropdown V 0.3.0 - 2021-03-06 * "+system" is more visible if selected ** shows a "pointer cursor" now * show field-names in "all Fields" tab * complete redesign V 0.2.4 - 2020-12-25 * update license V 0.2.3 - 2020.01.19 * Update license link/text V 0.2.2 - 2019.02.27 * add "include system tiddlers" option per tab * work with a single template instead of duplicated code * Adjust minimum TW version to V5.1.18 because of "subfilter" usage V 0.1.0 - 2019.02.19 * Make it more "update-friendly" ** wrappers are tagged instead of "search-list" tiddlers V 0.0.1 - 2019.02.19 * Initial release * Add "Field Search" tab to search results * Basic configuration options "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/icon","text":""},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/license":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/license","license-text":"https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/legalcode","text":"[[Field Search-Plugin|https://wikilabs.github.io/#field-search]] (c) Mario Pietsch - 2019-2024 [[Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike|https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/]] "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/readme","text":"This plugin adds a "Field Search" tab to the search results {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/CP/Settings/field-search}} !! This plugin replaces the following system modules
    <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search]plugintiddlers[]prefix[$:/core/]]">
  • <$link to=<>><>
"},"$:/ControlPanel/Settings/WikiLabs":{"title":"$:/ControlPanel/Settings/WikiLabs","caption":"WikiLabs","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/SettingsTab","text":"Get an overview about all [[WikiLab Pugins|https://wikilabs.github.io]]
<$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ControlPanel/WikiLabs]!has[draft.of]]" default="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/CP/Settings/field-search" explicitState="$:/state/tab/settings/wikilabs" />
"},"$:/core/ui/DefaultSearchResultList":{"title":"$:/core/ui/DefaultSearchResultList","caption":"{{$:/language/Search/DefaultResults/Caption}}","first-search-filter":"[!is[system]search:titlesort[title]limit[250]]","second-search-filter":"[!is[system]searchsort[title]limit[250]]","tags":"$:/tags/SearchResults","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"//{{$:/language/Search/Matches/Title}}// <$list filter="[minlength[1]]" variable="ignore"> <$list filter={{{ [get[first-search-filter]] ~[{$:/config/SearchResults/Default}get[first-search-filter]] }}}> addsuffix[-primaryList]] -[get[text]] +[then[]else[tc-list-item-selected]] }}}> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/> //{{$:/language/Search/Matches/All}}// <$list filter="[minlength[1]]" variable="ignore"> <$list filter={{{ [get[second-search-filter]] ~[{$:/config/SearchResults/Default}get[second-search-filter]] }}}> addsuffix[-secondaryList]] -[get[text]] +[then[]else[tc-list-item-selected]] }}}> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/> "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/templates/ItemTemplate":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/templates/ItemTemplate","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"::: <$link />"},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/templates/ListItemTemplate":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/templates/ListItemTemplate","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"
<$link />
"},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/templates/Results":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/templates/Results","modified":"20210328092315108","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define showAll() <$checkbox field="search-set" checked={{!!opt-checked}} unchecked={{!!opt-unchecked}} class="wltc-show-system">+ system \end <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$set name=lst filter="[subfilter{!!search-set}] +[subfilter] +[subfilter{!!search-sort}]"> //Field: ''<>'' (<$count filter="""[enlist]"""/>) <>// <$list filter="[enlist]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate" emptyMessage="""
n/a
"""/> "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/templates/WrapperTemplate":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/templates/WrapperTemplate","caption":"Fields","opt-checked":"[all[]]","opt-unchecked":"[!is[system]]","search-set":"[!is[system]]","search-sort":"[sort[title]limit[250]]","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"`\define searchTerm() [search:$(field)$] \define openConfig() <$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab-1749438307" text="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/CP/Settings/field-search"/> <$action-navigate $to="$:/ControlPanel"/> - configuration needed - \end <$list filter="[[`<>`]indexes[]sortby{$:/config/field-search/sortby}]" variable=field emptyMessage="<>"> {{||$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/templates/Results}} ` "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/CP/Settings/field-search":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/CP/Settings/field-search","caption":"Field-Search","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/WikiLabs","text":"\define setDefault() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/fieldWrapper"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/aliasWrapper"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/captionWrapper"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/textWrapper"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/titleWrapper"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/core/ui/DefaultSearchResultList"/> \end The full documentation can be found at [[field-search plugin|https://wikilabs.github.io/editions/field-search/]] main page. {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/TabConfigurator}} !! Return to Default The following shaddow tiddlers have been modified: <> <$button actions=<> > Return to: Default Settings! "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/edit/exclude":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/edit/exclude","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"!! [[Exclude Fields|$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/edit/exclude]] <<< The following fields are excluded: ''{{$:/config/field-search/exclude}}'' Exclude from field list: <$edit-text class="wltc-max-width" tiddler="$:/config/field-search/exclude" tag="input"/> <<<"},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/edit/sortby":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/edit/sortby","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"!! [[Field Sort order|$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/edit/sortby]] <<< Sort order: [[$:/config/field-search/sortby]] <$edit-text class="wltc-max-width" tiddler="$:/config/field-search/sortby" tag="input"/> <<<"},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/ExistingTabs":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/ExistingTabs","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define getTempName() $:/temp/field-search/tabName \define getCurrentDataName() $:/config/field-search/data/$(currentCaption)$ \define getCurrentTabName() $:/config/field-search/tab/$(currentCaption)$ \define editConfig() <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> $overwrite=yes $template=<> tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/field-search/select" text=<>/> \end \define editConfigButton() <$button tooltip="Load Configuration" class="tc-btn-invisible" actions=<>>{{$:/core/images/copy-clipboard}} Edit \end \define deleteConfig() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-delete-tiddler" $param=<>/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-delete-tiddler" $param=<>/> \end \define deleteButton() <$button tooltip="Load Configuration" class="tc-btn-invisible" actions=<>>{{$:/core/images/delete-button}} Delete \end \define checkbox() <$checkbox tiddler=<> tag="$:/tags/SearchResults" checked="$:/tags/SearchResults" unchecked="" default=""/> \end !! [[Custom Search Configurations|$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/ExistingTabs]] <<< If the element is checked, the configuration will be used: <$list filter="[prefix[$:/config/field-search/tab/]]" emptyMessage="n/a"> <$vars currentCaption={{!!caption}}>
<><$link to=<>><> - used <$link to=<>> fields: ''<$list filter="[indexes[]sortby{$:/config/field-search/sortby}]" variable=field><>, '' <><>
<<<"},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/TabConfigurator":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/TabConfigurator","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define getTabName() $:/config/field-search/tab/$(tabName)$ \define getConfigName() $:/config/field-search/data/$(tabName)$ \define getTempName() $:/temp/field-search/tabName \define getTempSelect() $:/temp/field-search/select \define clearTemp() \whitespace trim <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} \end \define createTab() <$set name=newConfigName value=<> > <$wikify name=aa text={{$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/templates/WrapperTemplate}} output=text> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> $overwrite=yes $template="$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/templates/WrapperTemplate" caption={{{ [get[caption]] }}} text=<> tags="$:/tags/SearchResults"/> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> $template=<> $overwrite=yes tags="$:/tags/field-search/data"/> \end \define selectActions() <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<> $overwrite=yes $template={{{ [get[text]] }}} tags=""/> \end \define selectData() <$select tiddler=<> default="" actions=<> > <$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/field-search/data]]" > \end !! Default Setting <<< * <$checkbox tiddler="$:/core/ui/DefaultSearchResultList" tag="$:/tags/SearchResults" checked="$:/tags/SearchResults" unchecked="" default="$:/tags/SearchResults"> Add ''Default Search'' tab to the search dropdown! * <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/field-search/tab/Any Field" tag="$:/tags/SearchResults" checked="$:/tags/SearchResults" unchecked="" default="$:/tags/SearchResults"> Add ''Any Field'' tab to the search dropdown! <<< {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/ExistingTabs}} !! [[Create / Modify Configuration|$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/TabConfigurator]] <<< New caption: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="caption"/> <> Used fields: ''<$list filter="[indexes[]sortby{$:/config/field-search/sortby}]" variable=field><>, '' --- <$vars tabName={{{ [get[caption]] }}}> @@.columns3.j <$list filter="[all[]!is[system]fields:exclude{$:/config/field-search/exclude}sort[]sortby{$:/config/field-search/sortby}]" variable="field"> <$checkbox tiddler=<> index=<> checked="comment" default="closed" > <>
@@ <$list filter="[indexes[]sortby{$:/config/field-search/sortby}]" variable=field>
<><$edit-text class="wltc-max-width" tiddler=<> index=<> tag=input/>
--- <$list filter="[get[caption]matchaddprefix[Update ]else[Create]]" variable="buttonText" > <$button actions=<> disabled={{{[get[caption]then[no]else[yes]]}}}> <> <<< !! Tab Order <<< You can use ''drag&drop to sort'' the list: <> <<< {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/edit/exclude}} {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-search/ui/edit/sortby}} "}}}
